citations.narrative:
The contingency plan reviewed at time of inspection was underdeveloped and missing necessary components such as
identifying specific emergencies, a chain of command and who is responsible for fulfilling tasks. An inadequate
contingency plan could affect animal health and well-being. Licensees must develop an appropriate plan to provide for
the humane handling, treatment, transportation, housing and care of their animals in the event of an emergency. This
contingency plan must be reviewed annually and the documentation maintained thereof.
Correct by fully developing a contingency plan with the outlined components as described in the Animal Welfare Act by 30
June 2023.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with licensee.
n

narrative:
2.134 
   
Contingency planning. 
The contingency plan reviewed at time of inspection was underdeveloped and missing necessary components such as 
identifying specific emergencies, a chain of command and who is responsible for fulfilling tasks.  An inadequate 
contingency plan could affect animal health and well-being.  Licensees must develop an appropriate plan to provide for 
the humane handling, treatment, transportation, housing and care of their animals in the event of an emergency. This 
contingency plan must be reviewed annually and the documentation maintained thereof. 
 
Correct by fully developing a contingency plan with the outlined components as described in the Animal Welfare Act by 30 
June 2023. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with licensee. 
 
 n
